ValidationRule.description: D&O Notes required when status = received
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
$Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked', RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open') &&
AND( ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Received"), CONTAINS(Coverages__c , "Directors & Officers"), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2021-01-01"), ISBLANK(Directors_and_Officers_Notes__c ))
